title: Fix Privacy Policy URL by adding a dedicated Privacy Policy page and link

requirements.text: Add a dedicated Privacy Policy route at "/privacy-policy" that renders a standalone Privacy Policy page with clear English content describing data handling (no login, no personal data collection, calculations performed locally in the browser) and any relevant notes about third-party scripts (e.g., Google AdSense).
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /privacy-policy renders a non-blank page in the existing site layout (StickyNavbar + Footer).
The Privacy Policy page uses English user-facing text.
The page content explicitly states that the site does not require login and that calculations are performed locally in the browser.
The page includes a note that third-party advertising scripts (Google AdSense) may use cookies/identifiers as applicable.

requirements.text: Fix the footer "Privacy Policy" area so users can click to open the new "/privacy-policy" page (do not remove the existing short privacy summary text; keep it readable and consistent with the current design).
acceptanceCriteria: On the homepage and all tool pages, the footer contains a clearly clickable Privacy Policy link that navigates to /privacy-policy.
The footer layout remains consistent with the current design system (no major visual redesign).

requirements.text: Register the new "/privacy-policy" route in the TanStack Router and ensure it participates in the existing SEO system (dynamic title/meta/canonical) by adding an entry for "/privacy-policy" in the SEO route metadata configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: The router includes a working /privacy-policy route.
Visiting /privacy-policy updates document title, meta description, and canonical URL via the existing HeadTags mechanism.
The /privacy-policy SEO metadata is in English and consistent with the "Student Hub" brand name.

requirements.text: Update the static sitemap to include the "/privacy-policy" URL so it is discoverable by search engines.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/sitemap.xml contains an additional <url> entry for https://studenthub.com/privacy-policy with reasonable changefreq/priority consistent with other informational pages.
robots.txt remains valid and continues to reference the sitemap URL.

constraints: Do not add or require any authentication/login flow (including Internet Identity).
Keep the backend unchanged (site remains fully static; no new backend dependencies).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components) or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding a full Terms & Conditions page (unless explicitly requested later).
Changing existing tool UIs, layouts, or calculations.
Adding any new third-party integrations beyond what is already present (e.g., no new analytics services).
